title: ‘We Need to Share a Piece of the Pie’: ‘Greedy’ Tadej Pogačar Plays Diplomat at Giro d’Italia
content:
Pogačar takes back seat on stage 10 summit after grumbles of greed from rival teams, praises Tiberi's willingness to attack: 'Only rider that showed some balls'.

Read the full article at ‘We Need to Share a Piece of the Pie’: ‘Greedy’ Tadej Pogačar Plays Diplomat at Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
